item.title: ApacheConNA: On Security
item.description: ApacheConNA: On Security # During the security talk at Apache Con a topic commonly glossed over by developers was covered in quite some detail: With software being developed that is being deployed rather widely online (over 50% of all websites are powered by the Apache webserver) natually security issues are of large concern. Currently there are eight trustworthy people on the foundation-wide security response team, subscribed to security@apache.org. The team was started by
